title: On the nonexistence of NLS breathers
authors: Miguel \'A. Alejo and Ad\'an J. Corcho
abstract:
In this work, a rigorous proof of the nonexistence of breather solutions for
NLS equations is presented. By using suitable virial functionals, we are able
to characterize the nonexistence of breather solutions, different from standing
waves, by only using their inner energy and the power of the corresponding
nonlinearity of the equation. We extend this result for several NLS models with
different power nonlinearities and even the derivative and logarithmic NLS
equations.
